content.query:
IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.STG_marvel_hero_raw') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE stage1.STG_marvel_hero_raw
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE stage1.STG_marvel_hero_raw
(
    doc NVARCHAR(MAX)
)
WITH (
    DATA_SOURCE = [EDS_SynapseDvDemo],
    FILE_FORMAT = [EFF_Parquet],
    LOCATION = '/Stage1/marvel_hero/'
)

/* 
SELECT *
FROM stage1.STG_marvel_hero_raw 
*/
